short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower Recorder is a browser extension that records and analyzes meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower Recorder is a powerful tool designed to record meeting audio directly from your browser. Users can effortlessly capture important conversations and later access transcriptions and detailed summaries on our platform, ensuring they never miss a critical moment in their meetings.
